message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $115. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $100?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need a little more than $100 to make this work. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $105?  I'm confident you'll be thrilled with this product, and I want to make sure this is a win-win for both of us.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but unfortunately, I can't go above $100 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
